name: Fuzzball
description:
A lot of creatures called fuzzballs, are released in an old wizards castle by his young apprentice. The young man is also turned into one of the fluffy creatures himself, by accident. The old wizard gets a little upset, and orders the apprentice to get rid of the fuzzballs swarming all over his castle. If he succeeds, the wizard will turn him back to human form again.

This is a platform game, with 50 levels. To complete each level, you'll have to collect all the treasures, while at the same time avoiding, or killing, various enemies. You will face mostly other fuzzballs, but also other creatures. Each level is only a single Bubble Bobblish screen, but can take a while to complete anyway.

Touching an enemy once means instant death, and if you don't complete a level in time, you will be killed by mosquitoes entering the screen. To succeed in Fuzzball, you'll have to plan every move carefully, otherwise you'll die very quickly.

shot.caption: The wizards young apprentice has released the fuzzballs.
They are cute, but at the same time, a little dangerous.
The apprentice is turned into one of the creatures himself, and gets a mission: clear the castle from the other fuzzballs.
This is the first of fifty levels. You are the blue hair-ball with eyes, in the left corner.
To finish each level, you have to collect all the treasures.
Jumping over an abyss. If you miss the platform, you'll fall to your death.
You can fire small blue projectiles to kill enemies.
When you kill an enemy, it turns into a small ball. If you don't touch it in time, the enemy will ressurect into a more difficult and aggressive monster, with a different colour.
You have to be careful when walking on ice, or you'll slide off the platforms.
If the time runs out, these flies will enter the screen and kill you.
Sometimes you have to collect the treasures in the correct order. Otherwise the level will be impossible to complete.
Some levels have no enemies, and you have to do something really stupid to die.
Some monsters can't be killed, like the slimy thing I'm jumping over.
Surrounded by bouncing, unkillable spheres. I'm in big trouble...
